OOC: It was an intentional miss, but I guess reflexes still do their 
thing.  BTW, the base itself is also cloaked.  And if Flicker's at 
close range, he'd have to look WAY up to see Gatara's face - she's 
twelve feet tall, remember.  The average BW bot is slightly less than 
half that, from what I know.

Gatara laughs.  "You know as well as I do that Phoenix is no 
Predacon.  However, since you seem so ... concerned for her welfare, 
I will consider your offer.  What means, if any, do you have of 
transporting these supplies of yours?  They're obviously not here."

Jayde rolls her eyes and twirls her nailgun.  "You actually had to 
SAY that?" she chortles.  Gatara silences her with a glare, then 
turns her attention back to Flicker.

Riekan remains nearly emotionless and seemingly apathetic.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: O.k.
> 
> BIC:  Flicker dodges the grenade and transforms to robot mode, 
> landing in the middle.  He holds a plasma rifle, not pointed at 
> anyone, so it's not threatening, but the barrel is closer to Gatara 
> than any other Rouge.  He stares at her with contempt.
> 
> Flicker:  We Predicons have a reputation of backstabbing, her sense 
> of loyalty is something few of us have.  I intend to show her I 
have 
> learned at least a little loyalty from her.
> 
> His voice remains calm, but a tear comes to his eye where it is 
> plainly visable.
> 
> Flicker:  Now tell me.....what are your terms?
